summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, widening, altering and establishing of Corson Avenue over and across a portion of Tract One (1) in the Plat of the Julius Horton Tracts as recorded on Page One Hundred Seventy-one (171) in Volume Three (3) of Plats, in the City of Seattle, as a public street and highway; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment of the cost of said improvement be made by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
